overview: This Britney Foster-directed, girls-only affair kicks off when Holly Morgan finds some other girl’s panties in her girlfriend’s bedroom. That quickly sends her down a dark path that lands her in police officer Valerie Vasquez’s jurisdiction, where Holly quickly engages in revenge sex.  Holly also gets her revenge later sandwiched in between Alektra Blue and Roxy Deville. But when it all turns out to be a big mistake, Holly’s spurned lover Lexi Love makes it with Ariel X and Alex Devine. All the dildos come out, Ariel takes it in the butt and officer Vasquez returns for a cameo.
title: Babes Illustrated 16
